mapper.insert: insert into PUBLIC.BOOK (CURRENTLYISSUED, DESCRIPTION, NAME, AUTHOR_ID, CATEGORY_ID) values (#{currentlyissued,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update PUBLIC.BOOK set CURRENTLYISSUED = #{currentlyissued,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR_ID = #{authorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, CURRENTLYISSUED, DESCRIPTION, NAME, AUTHOR_ID, CATEGORY_ID from PUBLIC.BOOK
